text:
As of 2024-12-31, Citi reported:
- Total assets: 2.35 trillion USD
- Cash and cash equivalents: 276.53 billion USD
- Total debt: 335.81 billion USD
- Common stock equity: 190.75 billion USD
- Tangible book value: 166.95 billion USD
- Net debt: 59.27 billion USD

As of 2023-12-31, Citi reported:
- Total assets: 2.41 trillion USD
- Cash and cash equivalents: 260.93 billion USD
- Total debt: 324.08 billion USD
- Common stock equity: 187.85 billion USD
- Tangible book value: 163.33 billion USD
- Net debt: 63.14 billion USD

As of 2022-12-31, Citi reported:
- Total assets: 2.42 trillion USD
- Cash and cash equivalents: 342.02 billion USD
- Total debt: 318.70 billion USD
- Common stock equity: 182.19 billion USD
- Tangible book value: 158.07 billion USD
- Net debt: not available

As of 2021-12-31, Citi reported:
- Total assets: 2.29 trillion USD
- Cash and cash equivalents: 262.03 billion USD
- Total debt: 282.35 billion USD
- Common stock equity: 182.98 billion USD
- Tangible book value: 157.18 billion USD
- Net debt: 20.31 billion USD

As of 2020-12-31, Citi reported:
- Total assets: not available
- Cash and cash equivalents: not available
- Total debt: not available
- Common stock equity: not available
- Tangible book value: not available
- Net debt: not available
